TestCaseMetaData.id: Final result to wrong patient - GU
TestCaseMetaData.name: Final result to wrong patient header
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The LIS system creates and delivers an electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. This test plan is designed to test the systems' capability to process the progression from a "final" to "wrong patient" report.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S. No other Pre-Condition.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: The test message information received by the EHR-S has been incorporated with the patient's record.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate ability to import and incorporate a final result message and handle report that the initial final result was sent for the wrong patient.
